question: Prasar Bharati has signed MoU with which country's public broadcasting agency to step up cooperation in the broadcasting sector?
explanation: India\'s largest public broadcasting agency, Prasar Bharati has signed an MoU  with Societe Nationale de Radiodiffusion et de Television (SNRT) at the 5th India Morocco Joint Commission Meeting (JCM) in Rabat, Moroccoâ€™s to step up cooperation in the broadcasting sector. The SNRT is the public broadcaster of Morocco and is a member of the European Broadcasting Union (EBU).
